DONT CHANGE ANYTHING IN THIS FILE: DONT CHANGE ANYTHING IN THIS FILE UNLESS YOU KNOW WHAT YOU'RE DOING

Add a command history: Add a command that allows you to see your command / input history. You could then choose a command and, for example, rerun it or maybe reverse it, etc...
Make Prince Renathal not as hardcoded: Prince Renathal right now is pretty hardcoded, so fix that.
Fix dc renathal bug: If you add Prince Renathal to a deck in the deck creator, then remove him, the deck will still require 40 cards. This is only a bug on the deck creator side, and the resulting deck would be pseudo-valid.
Cc multiple keyword methods: Allow the card creator to add multiple keyword methods per card.
Make a replay system: Add a replay system so you can save a game to a file to replay like a video. This would make bugfixing a lot easier.
Add more input options to the ccc: Add more input options to the custom card creator, other than question.
Do more extensive testing: Do more extensive testing. Add more test cases per test, and make sure all function have a test.
Add a guide script: This could guide you through the game, the dc, and the cc (maybe even teach you how to make cards). It would be like a tutorial.

stableIntroText: This is the main (stable) branch. This branch is older, but is more stable. I recommend you use this branch.
developIntroText: This is the develop (beta) branch. This has more features, but is less stable. I would advise against using this branch if you can help it. The todo list is not final and can change.
topicIntroText: This is a topic (feature) branch. This branch exists to add one single feature, can be highly unstable, and will be deleted in the future once the feature is done. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND NOT USING THIS BRANCH FOR ANY REASON.
